title: Bright Family Apartment with Modern Comforts in Ustka's Port District
description: Welcome to your cozy family oasis in the growing Port District of Ustka. This airy apartment features 2 spacious bedrooms and 2 modern bathrooms, thoughtfully laid out over 76 sqm. Enjoy a sunlit dining area perfect for memorable meals, overlooking the private fenced yard. Built with environmental awareness, the property includes a rainwater collection system, and safety is assured with a cutting-edge video intercom. Pets are welcome, making this a truly warm home for the whole family.
neighborhood_description: The Port District is a safe and up-and-coming neighborhood, just moments from the city center of Ustka. It's well-connected with direct highway access and scenic bike lines, perfect for both commuters and explorers. The tech-oriented vibe of the area draws progressive families and expats alike, with everything you need conveniently close.
lifestyle_benefits: safe and friendly neighborhood for families
outdoor activities nearby with bike paths
target_buyer: This apartment is perfect for expat families or professionals seeking a friendly, contemporary home base blending comfort and functionality.
market_positioning: Well-positioned for buyers looking for modern amenities in a low-urban, tech-oriented district at great value. A fantastic investment for those new to Ustka, balancing tranquil living with convenient access to the city center and road networks.
